title: Familiar Sans Serif – i's & m's
content:
Just can't place this Sans Serif, any thoughts?

Thanks  
Chris

Font: 

 Marimekko Sans 

Solved By: 

 [sanderpe](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831053908/http:/typophile.com/user/212473 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font\_id.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831053908/http:/typophile.com/files/font_id_4.jpg) | 167.25 KB |
author: Cafeteria

comments.content:
It’s Marimekko Sans, custom made exclusively for Marimekko. [http://typophile.com/node/63629](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831053908/http:/typophile.com/node/63629 "http://typophile.com/node/63629")  
If you’re looking for an alternative; it’s very similar to Avenir/Avenir Next in bold.

Nice. And thanks, we'd looked at a few like Avenir, Antique Olive and similar and couldn't place it. Cheers for the answer.

Chris
